title: Social Security increases are coming soon — but there’s a catch
description: With 2026 right around the corner, Social Security recipients are preparing for new policy changes, COLA increases and rising healthcare costs to take effect...
content: For the near 75 million Americans depending on Social Security benefits to survive, the SSAs annual Cost of Living Adjustment serves as an important announcement to start planning their monthly budge… [+3453 chars]
